product.longDescription: Everyone wants crunch in their mixes, but crunchy baby leaf varieties can be hard to find. We selected crunchy and crispy types — including new varieties from independent breeders — and formulated this mix to strike the right balance of color, leaf shape, and growth rate. For maximum crunch, grow from early spring to late fall. Includes red romaine, green romaine, green oakleaf, and red oakleaf lettuces. MT0-30. Varieties are subject to change depending upon availability. Avg. 100,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 1,000 seeds.

Starstruck Lettuce Mix Vegetable Seed

Product ID:4462.114462

Everyone wants crunch in their mixes, but crunchy baby leaf varieties can be hard to find. We selected crunchy and crispy types — including new varieties from independent breeders — and formulated this mix to strike the right balance of color, leaf shape, and growth rate. For maximum crunch, grow from early spring to late fall. Includes red romaine, green romaine, green oakleaf, and red oakleaf lettuces. MT0-30. Varieties are subject to change depending upon availability. Avg. 100,000 seeds/lb. Packet: 1,000 seeds.
